News.Title: Manav Infra Projects Secures Metro Piling Contract
News.Summary: Manav Infra Projects has been awarded a contract worth Rs 11.82 crore (excluding GST) for piling works on MMRDA Metro Lines 4 and 5. The contract was secured from Rithwik Projects. Manav Infra Projects is noted to have a market capitalization of Rs 16 crore and is classified as a Small and Medium Enterprise (SME).
